## Video

### Video: Software

- [OBS](https://obsproject.com/)

### Video: Hardware

- A laptop.
- A camera.

## Audio

### Audio: Software

- [Audacity](https://www.audacityteam.org/)

### Audio: Hardware

- A dedicated soundboard.
- A studio mic.
- Some pop-filter (a sock is a great option).
- A fairly sound-absorbing room.

### Audio: Levels

- Never go over `0 db`.
- Aim for `-12 db` to leave some headroom.
